author: Anthony C
comment: This does the exact same thing the standard nest wear app does, not sure why I'd need this, I got it because I thought it include the "turn fan on" function. Thanks anyway, going back to the nest app

author: Sajjid Begg
comment: Thanks for the update Dev. Works perfectly now. Really simple and easy to use. Great work.
title: Works a treat

author: Jason Kruis
comment: This is a great app! Able to see and control my Nest temperature from my Huawei Watch! Tried the pro, and since I only have one Nest, decided to stick with the base version. I would upgrade to the pro if it showed the humidity, that would be a really good addition! Also would be good if it showed the local temp outside the house.

author: Mike Cutmore
comment: Basic temperature control & colour coding for burner. Love that. Isn't it strange third party apps need to be relied upon to do basic stuff that original product companies or teams have already been paid through the nose for! So, thank you for providing this.
title: Works well

author: Asim Iqbal
comment: Works well (Moto 360) and the change of colours when increasing the temperature brings it in line with the official app. The fact that's it's free is a big plus, I'll probably pay for the pro version to get voice control. Only 'downside' is the basic UI but it doesn't hamper functionality.
title: Does what it says on the tin. For free!

author: Marc T
comment: I have a Samsung Gear S2 Classic, and the app never made it to the watch.  Not sure if it's compatible..

author: Chris Peterson
comment: I have uninstalled three times.  Connects but is always updating.  Displays null on watch.  Other wear nest companions work fine but this one has an amazing interfaces.  Suggestions?  Running on moto 360

reply.author: {epr}.io
reply.content: We do have a bug in regards to multiple structures/homes which can cause problems, we are working on this this week. If you don't have multiple structures, check if the mobile app can see all your thermostats

author: Paul Clark
comment: When I open the app it shows the current temps, when I try to change the temp it just sits with "updating" on the screen, the commend never gets to the thermostat
title: Doesn't seem to do anything

author: E. B.
title: OK. I can set the low (heating) temperature but how do I control the cooling temperature from wear?

author: Emily Connor
comment: Does exactly what I wanted it to  It was hard to get it to connect with thermostat but works great after that.

author: Tim Arndt
comment: Does exactly what you would expect an android watch to do stock. Helpful addition!
title: Great app

author: Simon Spooner
comment: constant disconnects.  only seems to work while the android app is in the foreground for about 30 Seconds.
title: doesn't work.
